# WeatherChange.Direction

**Enumeration**

An enum that specifies the direction in which a measurable aspect of the weather is expected to change.

## Declaration

```swift
@frozen enum Direction
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **WeatherChange.Direction.decrease**: The value will be significantly lower than before.
- **WeatherChange.Direction.increase**: The value will be significantly higher than before.
- **WeatherChange.Direction.steady**: The value will remain similar to before.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Copyable
- Decodable
- Encodable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
